name: Sky Pocket Shooting 2018
description:
Sky Pocket Shooting 2018!!!!
A very thrilling adventurous game that you never experienced before!Plan your tactical scenarios, test your skills to defeat threatening in the world campaign, fight against other planes in the dog-fight. An excitement without limits.
FEATURES
-High quality sound effects
-Amazing high definition Graphics
-Interesting missions
-Destroy enemies planes to gain extra powers and extra bombs in your pocket
